project_descr: The Funding Facility for Economic Reform (FFER-Federal) is intended to support the Iraqi federal government in its efforts to ensure implementation of reforms

outputs.output_descr:
Output 1
Support the newly established ERU in its mandate as reform platform.
Output 2 Support the implementation of specific action plans for identified reform priorities.
